item.title: Items degrading !-HELP-!
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:7, topic:297404”][quote author=12mil link=topic=393435.msg2927865#msg2927865 date=1251113137]
…
Nvm about that,
How about 150 Hits, now can some1 help?

i dont ask to be spoonfed, the other day i was looking through my client.java and i saw, Crystal bows and sheilds, so now i am wondering how can i make the armour Vesta and the weapons, degrade?
and here is my code:

public void degradeVestaLong() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1101 && hitsLeft < 1) { playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1); deleteItem(1101, 1) setEquipment(-1, playerWeapon); sM("Your vesta long sword vanishes!")
I know some of it anit Correct, but i need some help with it, i also dont understand how my server would be able to read the “hitsLeft”.
and i get errors saying cant find vairble “hitsLeft”.

[/quote]

Make a new int, short or whatever you want and name it whatever you want and place it there.
In your melee combat method make that number decrease.[/quote]
OMFG! thanks, but one thing what is the melee combat method? and how would i make the number decrease, this is my first try at degrading Stuff lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Items degrading !-HELP-!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“12mil, post:6, topic:297404”]…
Nvm about that,
How about 150 Hits, now can some1 help?

i dont ask to be spoonfed, the other day i was looking through my client.java and i saw, Crystal bows and sheilds, so now i am wondering how can i make the armour Vesta and the weapons, degrade?
and here is my code:

public void degradeVestaLong() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1101 && hitsLeft < 1) { playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = -1); deleteItem(1101, 1) setEquipment(-1, playerWeapon); sM("Your vesta long sword vanishes!")
I know some of it anit Correct, but i need some help with it, i also dont understand how my server would be able to read the “hitsLeft”.
and i get errors saying cant find vairble “hitsLeft”.[/quote]

Make a new int, short or whatever you want and name it whatever you want and place it there.
In your melee combat method make that number decrease.

item.title: Items degrading !-HELP-!
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Taharok:

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.
